custom-action.name: getaccountlist
custom-action.description:
Get the list of account available in the network .
Possible parameters are: - NodeIP (required): The Ethereum RPC node's IP address Default value is "The Ethereum RPC node's IP address ". - NodePort (required): RPC port of the node Default value is "RPC port of the node".

custom-action-parameter.name: NodeIP
custom-action-parameter.value: The Ethereum RPC node's IP address
